entry.title: Urban Legends: What You Code Makes You Who You Are
entry.summary:
Description

Tools are just a means to an end. So why do developers think the language they use defines the problems they solve.

This talk will take a look at misconceptions across the board, some experiences, both positive and negative, people have had crossing barriers to new languages, and show some of the benefits thinking of one's self as a coder and not a "Ruby coder" or a "Python dev" can have on being a better problem solver.
